help.help: Shows information about how to use commands, with optionally a command as argument to get more detailed information.
help.short-help: Shows information about how to use commands
help.response-command-not-recognized: The command '{{command}}' is not recognized. Type `{{help}}` to see the list of commands.
help.response-all-help:
{{help}}

Commands marked with an asterisk might be restricted.

info.help: Shows general information about the bot.
info.short-help: Shows general information about the bot, including memory usage, uptime, etc.
info.response-description: This bot has been created by {{creator}}, mainly for usage on the Discord server of the Guild Wars 2 guild *Legacy of the Six*.
